description: Lista de raster y vectores presentes en la IDE de la Facultad de Ciencia y Tecnología - UADER
name: IDE Facultad de Ciencia y Tecnologia UADER

description: Elevation data and ortho photos Spatial temporal catalog test
name: ALS Raster Kaernten 2023

name: ALS Raster Kaernten

description:
## STAC Catalog
 Includes elevation data and orthophotos
name: z API Test

description: Digital Earth Australia (DEA) is a platform that uses spatial data and images recorded by satellites orbiting our planet to detect physical changes across Australia in unprecedented detail.
name: Digital Earth Australia

description: FedEO Clearinghouse provides interoperable access, following ISO/OGC interface guidelines, to Earth Observation metadata
name: FedEO Clearinghouse

description: openEO platform provides intuitive programming libraries to process a wide variety of earth observation datasets. This large-scale data access and processing is performed on multiple infrastructures, which all support the openEO and STAC API.
name: openEO Platform

description: VITO Remote Sensing EO Data Catalogue for the Terrascope platform. Offers Sentinel-1/2/5P, PROBA-V, WorldCover, DEMs, CLS and more.
name: Terrascope

description: openEO API to the VITO Remote Sensing product catalog and processing services.
name: VITO (openEO)

description: Catalogs of Brazil Data Cube (BDC) CBERS 4 Earth Observation data cube imagery on AWS.
name: EO Data Cubes for Brazil - CBERS 4

description: Catalogs of Brazil Data Cube (BDC) Sentinel-2 (A+B) Earth Observation data cube imagery on AWS.
name: EO Data Cubes for Brazil - Sentinel 2

description:
Imagery acquired by the China-Brazil Earth Resources (CBERS) and
Amazonia-1 satellites. The image files are recorded and processed by
INPE and are converted to Cloud Optimized Geotiff format in order to
optimize its use for cloud based applications. Daily updated and hosted on AWS.
name: CBERS and Amazonia-1 on AWS

description: GeoMet-OGC-API provides public access to the Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) and Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) data via interoperable web services and application programming interfaces (API).
name: MSC GeoMet - GeoMet-OGC-API

description: Canada Orthoimages 2005-2010 is the national medium-resolution imagery coverage of Canada. These digital raster data acquired by the Spot4 and Spot5 satellites comprise five spectral bands.
name: SPOT Orthoimages of Canada (2005-2010)

description: Data Catalog of the Swiss Federal Spatial Data Infrastructure
name: data.geo.admin.ch

description: WeatherLayers is Weather Visualization as a Service, providing pre-processed weather data for visualization and a frontend weather visualization library, which can be used with both cloud and custom self-hosted data. See [WeatherLayers](https://weatherlayers.com/) for more details.
name: WeatherLayers

description: Digital orthophotos from Lower Saxony in Germany, provided by LGLN.
name: Digitale Orthophotos Niedersachsen

description: Access to the mundialis Actinia service via an openEO interface.
name: mundialis Actinia (openEO)

description: Monthly mosaics of sentinel-2 images over Catalonia, choosing lowest cloud coverage for each timespan. Indexes several collections of different Cloud Optimized Geotiffs: RGB de 8/16 bits, IRC  8/16 bits.
name: Monthly Mosaic of Sentinel 2 Images for Catalonia

owner.name: Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya

description: Release post: [https://creodias.eu/forum/-/message_boards/message/291442]
name: CREODIAS

description: The EODC API provides access to the EODC services and data (Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2 and Sentinel-3), as well as access to the openEO endpoints.
name: EODC API (openEO)

owner.name: EODC Earth Observation Data Centre GmbH

description: Open Science Catalog (OSC) Catalog by the European Space Agency (ESA)
name: Open Science Catalog

description: The Eurac Research backend provides EO data available for processing using OGC WC(P)S and the open data cube
name: Eurac Research (openEO)

description: A STAC catalog that contains all collections available on the FAIRiCUBE Hub and within the Sentinel Hub openEO backend.
name: FAIRiCUBE Hub Catalog

owner.name: The Climate and Environmental Research Institute NILU

description: This is the Google Earth Engine Driver for openEO. Google Earth Engine is a planetary-scale platform for Earth science data & analysis. It is powered by Google's cloud infrastructure and combines a multi-petabyte catalog of satellite imagery and geospatial datasets with planetary-scale analysis capabilities. Google makes it available for scientists, researchers, and developers to detect changes, map trends, and quantify differences on the Earth's surface.
name: Google Earth Engine (openEO)

description: Analysis Ready Data from the Finnish Meteorological Institute in the Finnish reference grid epsg:3067. Sentinel-1 and -2 as dekad mosaics as main items, but many other related data sets over Finland are included as well. For example the forestry inventory data as COGs are available as well.
name: FMI ARD Finland

description: Up to date Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 catalog used for demo with rocket client.
name: Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 catalog

description: Sentinel 2 Surface Reflectance over Ghana using SIAC AC.
name: S2 for Ghana

owner.name: Jasmin. The UK data analysis facility for environmental science

description: Sample imagery from flight campaigns ran by Satellite Vu in March and April 2021. Consists of 5 images resampled to the highest resolution achievable by Satellite Vu sensor from orbit.
name: Satellite Vu public static STAC

description: This STAC catalog contains Sentinel 2 (S2) surface reflectance over the UK from 2017 to 2019. The surface reflectance have been processed by SIAC atmospheric correction method, with per pixel uncertainty information.
name: UK NCEO Analysis Ready Data (ARD)

description: Observations from the Sentinel-3 satellite of the European Commission’s Copernicus Earth Observation Programme, available in Level 2 and 3. Hosted on AWS.
name: Sentinel 3 Level 2+3 on AWS

description: Observations from the Sentinel-5 Precursor (Sentinel-5P) satellite of the European Commission’s Copernicus Earth Observation Programme. Hosted on AWS.
name: Sentinel 5P Level 2 on AWS

description: Spatio-Temporal Asset Catalog containing various geospatial products distributed by West University of Timisoara
name: UVT STAC Catalog

description: Some open data sets from the Russian Federal Space Agency, e.g. from the Meteor-M and Electro-L satellites.
name: ERS open data

description: Sentinel Hub Catalog is an API implementing the STAC Specification, describing geospatial information about different data used with Sentinel Hub.
name: Sentinel Hub

owner.name: Sinergise Laboratory for geographical information systems, Ltd.

description:
SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog API on top of [NASA's Common Metadata Repository](https://cmr.earthdata.nasa.gov/search/). The Common Metadata Repository (CMR) is a high-performance, high-quality, continuously evolving metadata system that catalogs Earth Science data and associated service metadata records.

This API only contains STAC Collections where the Item Assets are available "in the cloud" (i.e., on s3).
name: NASA CMR CLOUDSTAC Proxy

description: ISS SERVIR Environmental Research and Visualization System (ISERV) Level-0 Product. These products were created at the ISERV Science Operation Center (SOC) at the National Space Science and Technology Center. ISERV is an automated system designed to acquire images of the Earth surface from the International Space Station (ISS).
name: NASA ISERV

description: LiDAR 3DEP elevation data over the conterminous United States, Hawaii, and the U.S. territories, acquired over an 8-year period. Hosted on AWS.
name: USGS 3DEP LiDAR Point Clouds

description: Analysis Ready Data (ARD) hosted by USGS Astrogeology. This catalog is organized by planetary body (e.g., Mars or Jupiter). Within each sub-catalog, users will find ARD orgamized by moon and/or data type (e.g., Europa, or kaguyaTC DTMs) depending upon how much logical nesting is required.
name: USGS Astrogeology Provided Analysis Ready Data

description: USGS authoritative source for Landsat Collection 2 data
name: USGS Landsat Collection 2 API

description: Astraea Earth OnDemand geospatial imagery query and analysis tool
name: Astraea Earth OnDemand

description:
This open SAR dataset contains > 100 Capella Space scenes.

Imaging modes: Spotlight, Stripmap and Sliding Spotlight.

Image product types: Single Look Complex (SLC), Geocoded Terrain Corrected (GEO), Geocoded Ellipsoid Corrected (GEC) and Sensor Independent Complex Data (SICD)
name: Capella Space Open Data

description: SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog API on top of NASA [Common Metadata Repository](https://cmr.earthdata.nasa.gov/search/). The Common Metadata Repository (CMR) is a high-performance, high-quality, continuously evolving metadata system that catalogs Earth Science data and associated service metadata records.
name: NASA CMR STAC

description: Satellite data to support disaster response worldwide.
name: Disasters Charter Mapper Catalog

owner.name: The International Charter Space and Major Disasters

description: A STAC API of [AWS Public Datasets](https://registry.opendata.aws/).
name: Earth Search

description: A ten class global land use/land cover (LULC) map for the year 2020 at 10 meter resolution.  Created by Impact Observatory in partnership with Microsoft and ESRI.
name: esri-lulc-2020

description: List of all rasters and vectors present in the [Google Earth Engine Catalog](https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/).
name: Google Earth Engine

description: Root Catalog for Maxar ARD sample data. All contents Ⓒ Maxar and for evaluation only.
name: Maxar ARD Sample Data

description: Root catalog for the [Maxar Open Data Program](https://www.maxar.com/open-data) imagery generated through the Maxar ARD pipeline.
name: Maxar Open Data Catalog (ARD format)

description: Searchable spatiotemporal metadata describing Earth science datasets hosted by the Microsoft Planetary Computer
name: Microsoft Planetary Computer STAC API

description: Example STAC Item for an entry on OpenAerialMap, created during the STAC Intro and Q&A.
name: OpenAerialMap Example

description: A catalog of topography datasets hosted by OpenTopography
name: OpenTopography Data Catalog

description: This catalog serves as the main root STAC Catalog for Planet Labs. It links to 3 small static catalogs of open data, including a small set of Planet Disaster Data, some CC-BY SkySat collects and the complete Spacenet 7 images and labels.
name: Planet Labs STAC Catalog

description: Includes data from multiple projects, each with 2m GSD and usually available in mosaics and strips: ArcticDEM (DEMs over the Arctic, starting 2007), EarthDEM (DEMs over non-polar regions, staring 2008) and REMA (Reference Elevation Model of Antarctica, starting 2009).
name: Polar Geospatial Center Data Catalog

description: Open library for geospatial training data to advance machine learning applications on Earth Observations.
name: Radiant MLHub

description: Sentinel1 radiometric terrain corrected backscatter (RTC) over CONUS since 2017. These radar data have been processed from original GRD scenes into a Radiometrically Terrain Corrected, tiled product suitable for analysis.
name: Sentinel-1 RTC CONUS

description: The Forest Observatory is a data-driven forest monitoring system that maps the drivers of wildfire behavior across the state with a focus on vegetation fuels. Data are available for non-commercial use under the Forest Observatory [terms of use](https://forestobservatory.com/legal.html).
name: California Forest Observatory

description: Experimental STAC catalog of ocean, weather, and climate data stored in Zarr format in Google Cloud Storage.
name: Pangeo Cloud Data Catalog

description: Nightly visible radiance catalogues from VIIRS DNB NPP for 2012/04 through 2020/12.
name: World Bank - Light Every Night
